name: Bite the Bullet (itch) ([noblelemon])
description:
Fast! Hungry! Bullet!

In Bite the Bullet you are a hungry bullet trying to eat melons and avoid obstacles. Get the melons for extra points but avoid the blocks and mines!

However, sometimes it may be too tough to make it through and you may need to "bite the bullet" and crash into a mine to clear the way. Or maybe you missed some melons and may want to fly into a steel block.

The choice is yours!

Use the Arrow keys to move. Right arrow will speed you up, Left arrow will slow you down. Up and Down arrows will steer Bite.

F2 will restart the game.
